actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to more effectively utilize the Community Development Program to assist units of general local government with urgent needs relating to the repair and reconstruction of public works with major defects caused by Federal construction activity relating to such public works.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to assist units of general local government within metropolitan areas in the repair of physical defects in Federal public works projects (such as vaulted sidewalks).

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to more effectively utilize the Community Development Program to assist units of general local government with urgent needs relating to the repair and reconstruction of public works with major defects caused by Federal construction activity relating to such public works.
